content: अपचयः {@--1@} Diminution, decrease, decay, decline, fall (<ab>fig.</ab> also.); कफापचयः <ls>Dk. 160</ls>; तेनास्यापचयं यांति व्याधेर्मूलान्यशेषतः <ls>Suśr.</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 130</ls>; defeat <ls>Mv. 2. 13.</ls> {@--2@} Loss, privation, failure, defect; <ls>H. 3. 133.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of several planetary mansions.
